short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Don't know what something means? Just highlight it and we will figure it our for you.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Not sure what a particular word means or refers to? Just select the word or phrase, and press Ctrl + Space (Command + Space on mac) and wallah! You got all the details of the word right in front of you. 

This includes:
    - An excerpt and image (if any) from Wikipedia
    - Meaning of the word including pronunciation and other details that you will find in any normal web dictionary
